articles.description: Follow radio and text coverage as Scotland seek to clinch Euro 2024 qualification against Spain.
articles.title: Build-up as Scotland seek Euro 2024 qualification in Spain

articles.description: Australia suffer their heaviest World Cup defeat as they are beaten by South Africa in Lucknow.
articles.title: South Africa trounce woeful Australia at World Cup

articles.description: Mark Telea is dropped by New Zealand for Saturday's Rugby World Cup quarter-final with Ireland after breaking team protocol.
articles.title: All Blacks drop winger Telea over protocol breach

articles.description: The Russian Olympic Committee has been suspended "with immediate effect" says the International Olympic Committee.
articles.title: IOC suspends Russian Olympic Committee

articles.description: A period of silence will be held before England's game with Australia for "the innocent victims of the devastating events in Israel and Palestine".
articles.title: Wembley silence for innocent victims in Israel and Palestine - FA

articles.description: Australia's Marcus Stoinis is given out for gloving the ball to South Africa wicketkeeper Quinton de Kock following review, despite his glove appearing to be off the bat handle during the Cricket World Cup clash in Lucknow, India.
articles.title: Was Stoinis really out?

articles.description: Warren Gatland says the controversial World Cup draw is not Wales' fault and rivals should have done better four years ago.
articles.title: You can't blame Wales for World Cup draw - Gatland

articles.description: Daniel Akinkunmi has only been playing American football for two years but has been recruited by one of the top colleges in the US.
articles.title: 'Is this real?' - UK teen takes next step on path to NFL dream

articles.description: Rugby's new global tournament - the women's WXV competition - starts on Friday. How does it work and when are the matches?
articles.title: What is WXV? Rugby's new global tournament explained

articles.description: The Grand National will be reduced to a maximum of 34 runners from 40 as part of measures designed to improve safety.
articles.title: Grand National field to be cut in safety move
